header.name: chaos/preprocessor/punctuation/comma_if.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that conditionally expands to a comma.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to a comma if its argument is non-zero.

usage.param: The condition that determines whether the macro should expand to a comma. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If cond is non-zero, this macro expands to a comma preprocessing token. Otherwise, it expands to nothing.
